data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paz-Rios, Carlos E., Ardisson, Pedro-Luis (2014): Elasmopusyucalpeten sp. n. (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Maeridae) from the northern Yucatan coast, with a key for the genus in the Gulf of Mexico and biogeographic comments. Zoosystematics and Evolution 90 (2): 95-104, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.90.8059, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.90.8059
